name: FerryRide
0:
”Alexa open Ferry Ride”
”Alexa ask Ferry Ride to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ferry ride
des:
Embark on a serene journey across the water with the Ferry Ride skill. Listen to the gentle lapping of waves against the hull, the distant call of seabirds, and the soft hum of the engine as you glide across tranquil waters. A perfect escape for anyone looking to recreate the peaceful experience of a leisurely ferry ride.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Ferry Ride
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
